      • setOvertime

        public boolean setOvertime(Shift shift,
                           java.sql.Time fromTime,
                           java.sql.Time toTime)
        Parameters:
        shift - Shift on which overtime has occurred.
        fromTime - Time where overtime has started. Typically the same as the shifts endTime.
        toTime - Time where overtime stopped.
        Returns:
        True if overtime was added successfully.

        Returns:
